item.title: Hacki
item.description: Intro Well, just finished my 90 days journey of OSCP labs, now here is my cheatsheet of it (and of hacking itself), I will be adding stuff in an incremental way as I go having time and/or learning new stuff. But this is basically the tools I tend to relie and use in this way the most. Hope is helpfull for you! Enumeration Network sniffing (using NMAP) I tend to run 3 nmaps, an initial one, a full one and an UDP one, all of them in parallel:
